events.name: El Niño Begins, Raising Concerns About Global Warming
events.wd_label: El Niño Begins, Raising Concerns About Global Warming
events.wd_description: US scientists have confirmed the onset of El Niño in the Pacific Ocean, a natural weather phenomenon that could exacerbate global warming and contribute to the planet exceeding the critical 1.5°C warming threshold.
events.description: US scientists have confirmed the onset of El Niño in the Pacific Ocean, a natural weather phenomenon that could exacerbate global warming and contribute to the planet exceeding the critical 1.5°C warming threshold.

events.name: Onset of El Niño
events.wd_description: El Niño, a natural weather phenomenon occurring every two to seven years, has begun in the Pacific Ocean, characterized by warm seas rising to the surface off the coast of South America.
events.description: El Niño, a natural weather phenomenon occurring every two to seven years, has begun in the Pacific Ocean, characterized by warm seas rising to the surface off the coast of South America.

events.name: Potential Impact on Global Warming
events.wd_description: Scientists warn that El Niño could contribute to the planet exceeding the 1.5°C warming threshold, as the phenomenon releases large amounts of heat into the atmosphere, potentially leading to record warm years.
events.description: Scientists warn that El Niño could contribute to the planet exceeding the 1.5°C warming threshold, as the phenomenon releases large amounts of heat into the atmosphere, potentially leading to record warm years.

events.name: Global Weather Implications
events.wd_description: The onset of El Niño is expected to affect global weather patterns, potentially causing drought in Australia, increased rain in the southern United States, and a decrease in India's monsoon.
events.description: The onset of El Niño is expected to affect global weather patterns, potentially causing drought in Australia, increased rain in the southern United States, and a decrease in India's monsoon.

events.name: Africa's largest oil refinery opens in Nigeria
events.wd_label: Africa's largest oil refinery opens in Nigeria
events.wd_description: The biggest oil refinery ever built in Africa opened in Nigeria, aiming to alleviate chronic fuel shortages. Although the plant is not yet operational, it can produce 650,000 barrels of petroleum products daily.
events.description: The biggest oil refinery ever built in Africa opened in Nigeria, aiming to alleviate chronic fuel shortages. Although the plant is not yet operational, it can produce 650,000 barrels of petroleum products daily.

events.name: Nigeria's fuel import situation
events.wd_description: Nigeria, a major oil producer, exports most of its oil while importing refined fuel for domestic use.
events.description: Nigeria, a major oil producer, exports most of its oil while importing refined fuel for domestic use.

events.name: Refinery details
events.wd_description: The refinery includes a power station, deep seaport, and fertilizer plant. Building the plant cost $19bn (£15.2bn).
events.description: The refinery includes a power station, deep seaport, and fertilizer plant. Building the plant cost $19bn (£15.2bn).

events.name: Statement by Aliko Dangote
events.wd_description: Aliko Dangote, the owner of the refinery and the richest man in Africa, stated that the first goal is to ramp up production to satisfy the country's needs this year.
events.description: Aliko Dangote, the owner of the refinery and the richest man in Africa, stated that the first goal is to ramp up production to satisfy the country's needs this year.

events.name: South Africa issues blanket diplomatic immunity for August summit
events.wd_label: South Africa issues blanket diplomatic immunity for August summit
events.wd_description: South Africa issued blanket diplomatic immunity to all leaders attending an August summit, potentially allowing Russian President Vladimir Putin to visit without fear of arrest on an ICC warrant.
events.description: South Africa issued blanket diplomatic immunity to all leaders attending an August summit, potentially allowing Russian President Vladimir Putin to visit without fear of arrest on an ICC warrant.

events.name: BRICS summit details
events.wd_description: South Africa will host a summit of BRICS groups (Brazil, China, India, Russia, and South Africa) in August, with a planning meeting of foreign ministers expected to take place on Thursday.
events.description: South Africa will host a summit of BRICS groups (Brazil, China, India, Russia, and South Africa) in August, with a planning meeting of foreign ministers expected to take place on Thursday.

events.name: Department of Foreign Affairs' statement
events.wd_description: The Department of Foreign Affairs backed the immunity, stating it is a standard conferment for all international conferences and summits held in South Africa and is not for specific individuals.
events.description: The Department of Foreign Affairs backed the immunity, stating it is a standard conferment for all international conferences and summits held in South Africa and is not for specific individuals.

events.name: Verkor supplying lithium batteries for Alpine C-Crossover GT
events.wd_label: Verkor supplying lithium batteries for Alpine C-Crossover GT
events.wd_description: Verkor will be supplying lithium batteries for the Alpine pure electric C-Crossover GT from its gigafactory in France starting in 2025.
events.description: Verkor will be supplying lithium batteries for the Alpine pure electric C-Crossover GT from its gigafactory in France starting in 2025.

events.name: Renault's investment in Verkor
events.wd_description: Since Renault made its investment in Verkor, the two companies have worked together at the Verkor Innovation Centre (VIC) in Grenoble to approve the technical quality and commercial production process of the battery products.
events.description: Since Renault made its investment in Verkor, the two companies have worked together at the Verkor Innovation Centre (VIC) in Grenoble to approve the technical quality and commercial production process of the battery products.

events.name: Dunkirk gigafactory production
events.wd_description: Verkor will be supplying batteries from its Dunkirk gigafactory.
events.description: Verkor will be supplying batteries from its Dunkirk gigafactory.
